text: Need Cameron Parker for Domino's campaign. Budget around $10,616, looking for 1 x 10-minute unboxing, 1 x YouTube video, 3 x Radio interview, 2 x YouTube short. 6 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 4 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $10,616 budget
